sentences.en: Agnew's car pulled into the driveway at exactly five o'clock.
sentences.cn: 阿格纽的车在5点整驶入了车道。

sentences.en: Any coach worth his salt would do exactly as I did.
sentences.cn: 任何称职的教练都会采取和我一模一样的行动。

sentences.en: Get several written quotations and check exactly what's included in the cost.
sentences.cn: 要几份书面报价,仔细查对费用中包含的内容.

sentences.en: He's not exactly homeless, he just hangs out in this park.
sentences.cn: 确切来说他并不算是无家可归，他只是老在这个公园里转悠。

sentences.en: It doesn't sound exactly orthodox, if I may say so.
sentences.cn: 恕我直言，那听起来不太符合常规。

sentences.en: It’s exactly half past five.
sentences.cn: 一分不差，正好5点半。

sentences.en: not exactly agitated, but disturbed.
sentences.cn: 不说是心急如焚，但有点心神不安。

sentences.en: On her own ground she knows exactly what she's doing.
sentences.cn: 她在自己熟悉的领域里对自己的行为有十足的把握。

sentences.en: Other people's jobs were exactly the same—sometimes good, sometimes bad.
sentences.cn: 其他人的工作也一样——时好时坏。

sentences.en: She knows exactly how to tug at readers' heartstrings.
sentences.cn: 她对如何牵动读者的心弦了如指掌。

sentences.en: She's had her blond hair done up exactly like Jackie's.
sentences.cn: 她把她的金发盘得和杰姬一模一样。

sentences.en: that too was not exactly convincing.
sentences.cn: 那也根本不能让人心悦诚服。

sentences.en: That’s exactly what we’ve been trying to tell you.
sentences.cn: 那正是我们一直想告诉你的。

sentences.en: The argument contained herein takes exactly the opposite point of view.
sentences.cn: 本文所持的论点恰恰是站在相反的立场。

sentences.en: The barb stung her exactly the way he hoped it would.
sentences.cn: 如他所愿，这句带刺的话刺痛了她。

sentences.en: The chocolate is then melted down to exactly the right temperature.
sentences.cn: 然后巧克力被熔化到了恰好的温度。

sentences.en: The figures may not be exactly right, but they’re close enough.
sentences.cn: 那些数字可能不是非常精确，但也相当接近。

sentences.en: They will go all out to get exactly what they want.
sentences.cn: 他们将尽最大努力实现自己的愿望。

sentences.en: We shall be landing in Paris in sixteen minutes, exactly on time.
sentences.cn: 我们将于16分钟后准时在巴黎降落。

sentences.en: You don't have to match your lipstick exactly to your outfit.
sentences.cn: 你不一定非要让唇膏的颜色同礼服完全搭配。

words.tran_cn: 恰好地；正是；精确地；正确地

trans.tran_cn: 精确地，确切地，正是如此；完全正确，（要求得到更多信息）究竟，到底
trans.tran_en: used when emphasizing that something is no more and no less than a number or amount, or is completely correct in every detail
